entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
